title: Passing Fancies
description: Bites of fiction, nibbles of imagination and feasts of invention.Flitter through fantasy, mystery and space.Passing Fancies is a book of collected short fiction, written mostly in the fantasy genre, with a smattering of crime and sci-fi dropping by as well. You will find tales short to long, amusing to chilling, wandering about the pages waiting just for you.
author: A.F. Stewart
